Waltham police chief facing criminal assault charges

Thomas M. LaCroix was arrested in his home Thursday on charges of assault and battery with a dangerous weapon and intimidating a witness. (Globe, 8:43 a.m.)

Boston parking spots may become parks

City planners are refining a pilot program to turn some parking spots into "parklets" — small, three-season patios with benches built flush with the sidewalk. (Boston Globe)
